《方舟投資主禱文》
我們在天上的母：願人都尊契媽的名為聖。
願契媽的國降臨，願契媽的電動車馳騁在地上，
如同爆升在天上。我們盼望的升幅，
求契媽今日賜給我們，又求饒恕石仔拋售的罪，
因為我們饒恕得罪SH的人。
不叫我們遇見破壞性創新，拯救我們脫離短炒。
離開方舟的叛徒，定必受到地獄之火的懲罰。
因為坐貨、賺錢、移民，
全是契媽的子民，直到永遠。阿們。

通識科卷一共設 3 條必答題，第一題問及電競發展，要求考生說明全球電競發展為社會帶來的潛在好處，以及香港電競產業的優勢及困難。

第二題則有關能源發展，要求考生寫出全球可再生能源、燃料新增投資的特徵、中國太陽能迅速增長的原因，並參考資料回應「太陽能的使用有助促進中國的可持續發展」句子。

replies.msg: CI Galaxy Ethereum ETF is designed to provide investors with a convenient and expedient way to gain exposure to Ether, the cryptocurrency built on the Ethereum blockchain, through an institutional-quality fund platform. ETHX will invest directly in Ether with its holdings priced using the Bloomberg Galaxy Ethereum Index (“ETH Index”), which is designed to measure the performance of a single Ether traded in U.S. dollars. The ETH Index is owned and administered by Bloomberg Index Services Ltd. ETHX.B will trade in Canadian dollars (unhedged) and ETHX.U will trade in U.S. dollars.

我上investing又有ETHXu 同ETHXb
除左vol唔同之外, 有咩分別?

CI Galaxy Ethereum ETF is designed to provide investors with a convenient and expedient way to gain exposure to Ether, the cryptocurrency built on the Ethereum blockchain, through an institutional-quality fund platform. ETHX will invest directly in Ether with its holdings priced using the Bloomberg Galaxy Ethereum Index (“ETH Index”), which is designed to measure the performance of a single Ether traded in U.S. dollars. The ETH Index is owned and administered by Bloomberg Index Services Ltd. ETHX.B will trade in Canadian dollars (unhedged) and ETHX.U will trade in U.S. dollars.
